info.description: This API allows Loop users to upload dataset, create annotation projects, and annotate tickets etc.
info.title: Loop REST API

parameters.name: pname
parameters.description: 'pname' means the name of the project. (e.g. demo)

parameters.name: taskInstruction
parameters.description: 'taskInstruction' means the task instruction of the project. Not required. (e.g. This is for demo show.)

parameters.name: maxAnnotations
parameters.description: 'maxAnnotations' means the limit of the number of annotations permitted for each individual case across all annotators. The value should be greater than 0. (e.g. 2)

parameters.name: labels
parameters.description: 'labels' means all the labels of the project. Conditionally required. (e.g. label1,label2,label3)

parameters.name: isMultipleLabel
parameters.description: 'isMultipleLabel' means allow multiple label selections. (e.g. true)

parameters.name: labelType
parameters.description: 'labelType' means the format of the project's label is text or numeric scope. (e.g. numericLabel || textLabel)

parameters.name: assignmentLogic
parameters.description: 'assignmentLogic' means what is the sequnce of the ticket returns. Conditionally required. (e.g. sequential || random)

parameters.name: assignee
parameters.description: 'assignee' means who will be assigned the annotation task. (e.g. ['xxx@xxx.com','xxx@xxx.com'])

parameters.name: selectDescription
parameters.description: 'selectDescription' means the columns which had been selected as the entry's content come from. (e.g.  ["column1","column2"])

parameters.name: header
parameters.description: 'header' means the header of the csv file. (e.g.  ["column1","column2","column3"])

parameters.name: isHasHeader
parameters.description: 'isHasHeader' means whether the csv file has a header or not. (e.g. yes || no)

parameters.name: annotationQuestion
parameters.description: 'annotationQuestion' means what annotation question will be showed to annotators.
parameters.default: What label does this ticket belong to ?

parameters.name: fileName
parameters.description: 'fileName' means the name of the csv. (e.g. file1.csv)

parameters.name: fileSize
parameters.description: 'fileSize' means the size of the csv. (e.g. 900052)

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: 'location' means the location of the csv file in S3. (e.g. 'uploads/xxx@xxx.com/1586934928434818196_file1.csv')

parameters.name: selectedDataset
parameters.description: 'selectedDataset' means the dataset name of the csv file. (e.g. dataset1)

parameters.name: min
parameters.description: 'min' means the minimun numeric of the numeric label. Conditionally required. (e.g. -10)

parameters.name: max
parameters.description: 'max' means the maximun numeric of the numeric label. Conditionally required. (e.g. 1000)

parameters.name: estimator
parameters.description: 'estimator' means the estimator of the active learning model. Conditionally required. (e.g. null || RFC || KNC || GBC) GBC means the GradientBoostingClassifier, KNC means the KNeighborsClassifier, RFC means the RandomForestClassifier.

parameters.name: projectType
parameters.description: 'projectType' means the type of the project. (e.g. null || text || tabular || regression || ner)

parameters.name: encoder
parameters.description: 'encoder' means the encoder method of the active learning model. Conditionally required (e.g. null || oneHot || embeddings).

parameters.name: src
parameters.description: 'projects' to get own projects. 'admin' to get all owners' projects. 'annotate' to get all own annotation task. 'community' to get all community datasets.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: 'pname' means the name of the project. (e.g. demo). 'pid' means the id of the project. 'previousPname' means the previous name of the project. 'assignmentLogic' means what is the sequnce of the ticket returns. Conditionally required. (e.g. sequential || random). 'frequency' means the active learing frequency. (e.g. 10). Trigger means the number of labelled entries that can trigger the active learing.

delete.description: Please be sure this delete is not reversible

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: 'pname' means that project's name.

delete.description: Please be sure this delete is not reversible, it only allowd to delete never used label

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: 'pname' means that project's name. 'label' means this project never used label

get.summary: get one project's information by project id

parameters.name: pid
parameters.description: 'pid' means the project id.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: 'pid' means project's id. 'share' means to share or not, has value true and false. 'shareDescription' means the description for this share.

parameters.name: pid
parameters.description: 'pid' means project's id.

get.summary: get # Annotations Per Category and # Annotations Per User

parameters.name: pid
parameters.description: 'pid' means project's id.

get.summary: get a single ticket or a batch of tickets sequentially or randomly

parameters.name: pid
parameters.description: 'pid' means that project's id.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: 'limit' means the size of the batch.

get.summary: get one project's all tickets also provide every ticket's annotation infomation

parameters.name: pid
parameters.description: 'pid' means project's id.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: 'page' means the page number.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: 'limit' means the # of tickets in one page.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: 'pid' means project's id. 'tid' means that ticket's id.

post.summary: append a new dataset to original project

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: 'pname' means the project's name. 'selectedHeaders' means the project's original selectDescription column during upload a csv. 'location' is needed when adding new entries by uploading csv.  'srdata' means the new added row and every columns key's value during adding new entries by row.  'csvFile' value is boolean true means to upload csv and false means addind new entries by row.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: 'tids' means that ticket's id. 'pname' means the project's name.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: 'pid' means project's id. 'tid' means that ticket's id.

get.summary: get all flag tickets from all annotators of one project

parameters.name: pname
parameters.description: 'pname' means project's name.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: 'page' means the pageNumber to go.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: 'limit' means the # of tickets in one page.

get.summary: get one user's all flag tickets of one project

parameters.name: pname
parameters.description: 'pname' means project's name.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: 'page' means the pageNumber to go.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: 'limit' means the # of tickets in one page.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: 'tid' means that ticket's id.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: 'tid' means that ticket's id.

parameters.name: pid
parameters.description: pid means the ID of the project

get.summary: get one ticket's information by ticket's id

parameters.name: tid
parameters.description: 'tid' means that ticket's id.

parameters.name: dsname
parameters.description: Name of the dataset. (e.g. dataset1)

parameters.name: hasHeader
parameters.description: Does the dataset csv has header or not

parameters.name: file
parameters.description: file to upload only support for: [.csv .zip .tgz]

delete.description: Please be sure this delete is not reversible

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: 'fileKey' means that dataset's fileKey. 'dsname' means the dataset's name.

parameters.name: pid
parameters.description: ID of the project

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: The format of the generated file. 'standard' means count of each label. 'top' means top label only. 'probablistic' means ratio of label relative to total.

parameters.name: src
parameters.description: where does generate or download comes from. Comes from 'projects', 'admin' or 'community'.

parameters.name: onlylabelled
parameters.description: Yes means to export only the labelled entries, No means to export all the entries.

parameters.name: pid
parameters.description: ID of the project

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: 'role' means that user's role. 'email' means the email address of the current user. 'uname' means that user's full name.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: 'role' means that user's role. 'user' means the email address of the current user.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: 'uid' means the email address of the current user.

get.summary: get the role of one user
